participant_1.background:
I enjoy cross stitch and quilting.
My father served in our military in the war.
I am proud to be an american.
I am what people call a baby boomer.
My parents were proud immigrants to america.

participant_2.background:
I collect vintage 50 s decorations.
I have two sons.
I eat granola for breakfast every day.
I have an exotic fish aquarium.

content.text: Hi! What are you up to today?
I'm just hanging out, enjoying the day. What about you?
I'm going to be working on a cross stitch project.
Oh, that sounds fun! I've always wanted to learn how to do cross stitch.
It's not that hard to learn! I'm sure you could pick it up quickly.
Maybe I'll give it a try. What are you working on?
I'm working on a picture of a lighthouse. I'm really enjoying it so far.
That sounds beautiful. I'd love to see it when you're done.
I'll be sure to send you a picture.
Thanks! I'm sure it will be great.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to collect vintage 50s decorations. I also have two sons and I eat granola for breakfast every day.
That's cool! I've never really been into collecting things, but I do love granola for breakfast.
It's a great way to start the day.
I agree! So, what are your sons like?
They're both great kids. They're both in school and they're both very active.
That's great! I'm sure they're a lot of fun to have around.
They are! I'm very lucky to have them.
So, what's your favorite thing about being a mom?
My favorite thing about being a mom is watching my sons grow and learn. It's amazing to see them develop into their own unique people.
I can imagine! It must be a wonderful experience.
It is! I'm so grateful for being a mom.
So, what's your favorite thing about being a baby boomer?
My favorite thing about being a baby boomer is the fact that I was born in a time of great change and progress. I've seen so many amazing things happen in my lifetime.
I can imagine! It must have been a very exciting time to be alive.
It was! I'm very grateful for the life I've been given.
So, what's your favorite thing about being an American?
My favorite thing about being an American is the freedom and opportunity that I have. I can be whoever I want to be and do whatever I want to do.
I can imagine! It must be a wonderful feeling to be so free.
It is! I'm so grateful to live in this country.
Me too! I'm glad we had this conversation. It was very interesting to learn more about you.
Thank you! It was nice to meet you too.
